jobDescription: Job TitleResearch Intern-San DiegoJob Description SummaryTo work with Cushman & Wakefield's Americas Retail Research team in helping to create an inventory of retail real estate throughout the United States along with various other research projects.Job DescriptionAssists with updates to proprietary commercial real estate databaseSurveying buildings using national third party databases in order to populate tenant and building databaseTrack and report on retail vacancy and availability trends and tenant mixes for retail real estate across multiple retail product typesResearch and analyze retailer trends and the global retail environmentParticipates in commercial real estate webinars led by top fee earners, leaders, shareholders and foundersAssists with primary research projects for retail clients and brokers within the Americas Retail Services Group Cushman & Wakefield provides equal employment opportunity. Discrimination of any type will not be tolerated. Cushman & Wakefield is an Equal Opportunity / Affirmative​ Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by state, federal, or local law.
